channel.title: friend on Joost Plattel
channel.description: Recent content in friend on Joost Plattel

item.title: Transcriptions from Friend in Obsidian
item.description: I’ve been wearing a Friend / Omi (not to be confused with the other one) for a couple of weeks. This project is interesting to me because of the open-source component and community that it has. So I made my own, including it’s own case. One thing I’ve been trying to find a solution for has been trying to get all transcription into my note taking program Obsidian. And I figured out a way to do this.
